pages.name: Ritual of Living Evolution
pages.text: Use a $(l:neovitae:rituals/ritual_diviner#dusk)Ritual Diviner [Dusk]$(/l) for easier construction.
Stand on the $(l:neovitae:rituals/ritual_stones)Master Ritual Stone$() while wearing $(l:neovitae:alchemy_array/living_equipment/living_basics)Living Armor$() to use this $(thing)ritual$().
